name: Flyglory Blog
body:
当制作引脚数比较多的器件的原理图封装时，可以使用AD提供的“smart grid insert”功能快速制作原理图封装库。

1.根据Datasheet中的器件引脚描述，制作元器件引脚表格，格式如下：
![](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20150725230536885?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center)

2.建立一个SCHLIB文件在右下角的SCH中选择SHCLIB List 

![](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20150725230559708?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center)
调整为Edit模式
![](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20150725230456508?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center)

3.在Excel中复制表格，在SHCLIB List 空白处单击右键选择Smart Grid Insert ,单击Automatically Determine Paste ，OK。
![](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20150725230511110?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center)
![](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20150725230526024?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center)
